entry.title: Venom Foundation in Partnership With Iceberg Capital Launches $1 Billion Venom Ventures Fund
entry.summary: Abu Dhabi, Abu Dhabi, 11th January, 2023, Chainwire Venom Foundation, the first Layer-1 blockchain licensed and regulated by the Abu Dhabi Global Market (ADGM), and Iceberg Capital, an ADGM regulated investment manager, officially announce that they have partnered to launch a $1 billion venture fund called Venom Ventures Fund (VVF).
